title: Welcome to Summit University Advancement Bureau.
desc1: Summit University - the University of Ansar-Ud-Deen Society of Nigeria - is a private university established to offer qualitative tertiary education to students irrespective of ethnicity, creed, and religion.
desc2: At the Advancement office, We are committed to building a modern and top-rated institution for a global academic experience. In line with the vision of our founding fathers, we are poised to create a destination for learners to pursue excellence and achieve their dreams.
